constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All applications for developments likely to attract birds or connected with an aviation use.Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of a hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension
decision_conditions: The erection of a hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B  of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Please provide details of materials used for new fences and driveways

Unless clearly specified otherwise, the base of the development shown on the approved plans is taken to be external ground level and not a Damp Proof Course or Internal Finished Floor Level. The external ground level is expected to remain consistent before and after construction of the approved development unless specified otherwise on the approved plans.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Appropriate repeat works to remove pollard regrowth for health and safety purposes and to prevent physicl damage from branch inpact upon the adjacent dwelling.Recommendation:Approve.
